resources.string: TumTumTracker, shortly TTT, is a project still in the development stages. On successful completion it will be able to help you track TumTum using either the Web or Android application and also a board displayed each bus stop

-Force closes on no internet connection
-A few known NULL pointer exceptions
-Showing a pop dialog instead of an anchored popup with the marker

Please bear with the issues. We are hoping to fix all of these, soon before the project goes live.
